text: Ani jevha manasala ekhadi duhkha-yatana pohocate, tevha amhala pukarato, pahudalelya sthititahi, basalelya sthititahi, ubha asatanahi. Maga jevha amhi tyaci duhkha-yatana dura karato, tevha to asa hoto ki janu tyane apalyala pohocalelya duhkha-yatanekarita amhala kadhi pukaraleca navhate1 ya maryada olandanaryanci karme tyacyakarita tyacapramane manapasanta banavili geli aheta
